channel.title: Categories on The Learning Curve
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on The Learning Curve

item.title: Digit Recognizer
item.description:
A machine learning based solution which helps recognize hand-written digits

TECHNOLOGY STACK
Algorithm Random Forest Classifier
Language MATLAB
Source Digit Recognizer

item.title: My Microblogger
item.description:
An application which provides a secure platform to posts microblogs and view others’ posts.

TECHNOLOGY STACK
Web Framework Flask
Auth. Framework OAuth 2.0
Front-End Jinja2, HTML, CSS
Database MySQL
Source Code My Microblogger

item.title: Car Insurace Predictor
item.description:
A machine learning based solution written in R which predicts the insurance option a customer would prefer analyzing traits of customers.

TECHNOLOGY STACK
Algorithm Flask
Language OAuth 2.0
Source Code Car insurance Predictor
